name: Green Clicker Game
description:
A small green clicker game, click the button to earn value, and sell value to earn cash. Use cash to buy Auto Clickers and Auto Sellers. 

Note: This is my first solo jam and first time foray into games programming. Thanks! :)

If playing in Windows, ALT+F4 to close the game.

Programming, Art, SFX by @Shuu_37

Music by @ZacCitron
